com.pb.sawdust.util

Enum SystemType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SystemType>
      • com.pb.sawdust.util.SystemType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SystemType>

    public enum SystemType
extends java.lang.Enum<SystemType>
    The SystemType enum is used for identifying operating systems.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SystemType.SystemFamily
      The SystemFamily enum is used to identify operating system families.

      • getLineSeparator

      • getFamilies

        public java.util.Set<SystemType.SystemFamily> getFamilies()
        Get the operating system families this operating system belongs to. If an operating system belongs to two families, they are ranked in order of precendence (e.g. the families of MAC_OS_X are UNIX and MAC, in that order, since Macintosh OS X is generally though to be more "Unix-like" than "Mac-like").
        Returns:
        this operating system's families.

      • getSystemType

        public static SystemType getSystemType()
        Get the system type the current JVM is running on.
        Returns:
        the system this JVM is running on.
